verbose_text: Net1 phosphorylation by a combination of Cdk and Plk releases active Cdc14 at anaphase onset, triggered by separase mediated downregulation of the PP2A Cdc55 phosphatase that counteracts Net1 phosphorylation.
evidence: phosphorylation by a combination of Cdk and Plk releases active Cdc14 at anaphase onset, triggered by separase-mediated downregulation of the PP2A
